SHORTTITLE  Karl Rubin: Shafarevich-Tate groups of CM and modular elliptic curves

  • Three papers related to Rubin's lectures:
    • “Elliptic curves with complex multiplication”: dvi, ps, pdf
    • “Euler systems and modular elliptic curves”: dvi, ps, pdf
    • “General Euler systems”: dvi, ps, pdf
  • Karl's web site has other preprints that may be of interest.
  • “Tate-Shafarevich groups of twists on an elliptic curve”: project description
